title: A suruay of the pretended holy discipline. Contayning the beginninges, successe, parts, proceedings, authority, and doctrine of it: with some of the manifold, and materiall repugnances, varieties and vncertaineties, in that behalfe
author: Bancroft, Richard, 1544-1610.
publicationStmtPublisher: By Iohn Wolfe [, Thomas Scarlet, and Richard Field],
